fields.name: discountTicketsRemaining
fields.description: Remaining number of redemptions left for early bird discount, null if no max quantity defined

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the early bird discount.

fields.name: maximumQuantity
fields.description: Maximum amount of discounts available for given promotion, null if no max quantity defined

fields.name: promotionEnds
fields.description: The datetime of when this promotion ends
